name: Brand Starter Kit
shortDescription: Get a professional logo, colors, and brand identity for your business.
heroDescription: Starting fresh or need a brand refresh? We create a cohesive brand identity with logo, color palette, and typography that makes your business look professional and memorable.

deliverables.title: Color Palette
deliverables.description: Primary and secondary colors that work together

deliverables.title: Typography
deliverables.description: Font selections for headings and body text

deliverables.title: File Package
deliverables.description: All files in formats you need (PNG, SVG, etc.)

whoItsFor: Companies with outdated or inconsistent branding
Anyone needing a cohesive visual identity

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We learn about your business and preferences

process.title: Deliver
process.description: We package all files and guidelines

seo.title: Brand Starter Kit Services
seo.description: Professional logo and brand identity design for small businesses. Get a cohesive visual identity that makes your business memorable.
